website_summaries.verdict: This stylish bed set offers great value for money. Comfortable and luxurious, with soft microfiber material.
pros: This breathable and lightweight bedding set features a simple, yet effective design
Includes a duvet cover and pillow shams in choice of several attractive colors
cons: Fewer pieces than other sets we considered, but provides an attractive, updated look for your bedroom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect duvet set! Look no further:)
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful duvet set!! So soft, natural wrinkles gives a cool look. I’m in menopause and suffer form hot flashes and this duvet keeps me cool throughout the night (bought silk filled Comforter as well). Had a slight issue with a product and received an immediate attention from customer service ! Top notch service, Thanks Joanna for your prompt reply and help ! Don’t hesitate buying this set, you’ll love it !
customer_reviews.author: M. Altman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value, super soft!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this duvet set. Immediately out of the packaging noticed how soft it was. And it fits true to a king size comforter. Have only had a short time but very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Already washed once and it held up great. Very soft and better quality than most of the duvets I’ve spent over double the price for.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this duvet cover for a few weeks. The quality is definitely beyond my expectation. I bought the grey color with king size. To be frankly, I didn’t expect too much with this price. When I received it though, I was surprised that how soft it is and how good it feels. It’s very easy to put the comfort in and it stays in place. The color is pretty neutral and can easily match any bed frames and headboard color. Overall I’m pretty happy about the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be a bit cheap because of the price, but just needed something temporary to match a new wall color. I was super pleasantly surprised at the quality and texture- it’s super lightweight and soft, but still feels well put together. The zipper has to be my favorite part- all of my past duvet covers are buttons that eventually come apart and look sloppy. I expected low quality, but found a great cover that I’ll purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: RachelB

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE QUALITY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my duvet cover and it was torn in two spots when I held it up to the light you could see it was torn. Definitely don’t recommend ordering this the quality is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: breonna

customer_reviews.title: but I love the color
customer_reviews.text: Ended up buying 3 duvets. I purchased the gray and ivory for my kids. I am not a big fan of pink (at all)...but I wanted a different color and the pink was the only other color available. I was very surprised, I love the color! These duvet cover are so soft...easy to put in the comforters I bought (Equinox All-Season Quilted Comforter -from Amazon, which are amazing!). I am so happy with all of the colors I got. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wright

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and soft!
customer_reviews.text: The duvet is true to color, soft, and comfortable. I like that the material is pretty thin because it is nice for summer. I am a texture person and I really care about my garments and bedding being soft, and I have to say, this duvet cover is truly soft. I would recommend this to a friend. The only disappointing part is that there are no ties inside to keep the comforter in place...but not a huge deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Maquillaje by Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, looks nice, right color.
customer_reviews.text: Since I know my 2 dogs are just going to lick their buttholes on my bedspread I was looking for something not expensive and easy to wash. Was skeptical when I saw this set but it was a great price at $28 and they had the color I needed. Arrived the next day, it’s super soft, and yeah has a few wrinkles but nothing the dryer can’t straighten out. Even if they end up tearing it in 4 months, totally worth it to protect my comforter and be able to wash all linens frequently/easily and have the bed look nice. Dogs approve.
customer_reviews.author: Sean and Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and it is pretty soft, but that's about it. I had no idea about the wrinkles and it just looks like I've left it in the dryer. The material is thinner than I thought it would be. It's too big and even though I tied the comforter corners it managed to somehow ball up in the middle and twist almost every night. I spent too much time making the bed . So disappointed and wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Van Aalsburg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the summer!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect sometimes bed linens that are not very pricey can be rough or made out of really awful materials. I sleep with two duvets and no top sheet. The duvet cover that is closest to my body gets washed regularly so it needed to be well made. This one was perfect, light weight, super soft almost like a micro-fiber. It has this crinkle look to the fabric which looks really great. It is way softer than my top sheet was. It has a nice zipper bottom, the color was exactly what I wanted a pink-peach color, very blush not cheap looking. I may buy one or two more in different colors for other beds.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McMoy

customer_reviews.title: Too washed out
customer_reviews.text: The color is really faded navy blue as if its been watched for a year or two. Personally the wrinkles are too much for a dark color it would look nice in light colors like beige, cream, white it would provide that vantage look
customer_reviews.author: sal s.

customer_reviews.title: Cover was already pilling upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this duvet cover last week and received this weekend. I was disappointed to find that it was already pilling upon arrival. (Specifically where the zipper and seam of the plastic bag touched the fabric) I took this as a sign that this would not hold up well to a basic wash, and returned immediately. Secondly, I ordered "blue grey" and it was very much just "grey" not what I was looking for there either, but less important given the quality.
customer_reviews.author: David and Kait

customer_reviews.title: Mad
customer_reviews.text: Picture is misleading this is a very thin set good for summertime but not for winter almost as thin as sheets so know I have to buy Comforters for 3 beds
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two, they don’t match.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my kids shared bedroom. The two I received don’t match. They aren’t quite the same color, one has the “vintage wrinkle” and the other is quite smooth. Different packaging but the same sku. I haven’t yet heard back from the seller on how to rectify the situation.
customer_reviews.author: ErinGilmore

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive photos
customer_reviews.text: These product photos can't be theirs...the color of the actual product is NOWHERE CLOSE to the pictures. I was expecting a light blue/grey almost real...I got a grey so dark it's almost navy (jeans in photo for comparison). So disappointing. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews for other similar products I decided to go with this one. It’s a beautiful blush light pink color. But like it says in another review, the duvet does wrinkle a lot even straight out of the dryer. I, however didn’t mind this because it gives the cover a textured look. It’s soft and lightweight as well and goes perfectly in my room. The ties on the inside are made of a soft stretchy fabric so I don’t know how long they will last. Either way, it was a great purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Crash Pad!
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought 2 of these to make a home made crash pad for our autistic daughter. 2 so I can take off the cover to wash and still have all the foam pieces in the actual cover. The fabric is quite thin and the zipper doesn't go all the way to the ends of the cover. Our one's zipper broke within seconds of taking it out of the package, by simply un zipping it. If I was using for actual bed I would not purchase, simply because of how thin the fabric is and how poorly the zipper is attached.
customer_reviews.author: MommaOfFive

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, not wrinkle free at all.
customer_reviews.text: I was very unhappy with this purchase, it's not wrinkle free at all. I would understand if there were a few wrinkles. But these duvet are so wrinkle they look like it was wrapped up in a ball while wet. I washed them and dry them and it didn't help the wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: MissIvy

customer_reviews.title: Practical and SUPER soft fabric!
customer_reviews.text: I received my product about a week ago and I immediately fell in love with the texture. This duvet is SUPER soft. The fabric design is already wrinkly, which is awesome, since I can roll all night long, mess it up, wake up next morning, extend it and looks like it’s just it’s design lol. I have not put my duvet inside of it yet, since it’s summer and I’m trying not to blow my electric bill, so I’m sort of excited for the colder days just so I can be even more cozier in my bed. So far, I’m one happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Renata N.

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really, really like this duvet cover. It's a great value for the money and doesn't feel cheap. It's breathable and does well to regulate temperature (but my insert helps with that too). SUPER SOFT and I'm very particular about what I call soft. So much so that this was my second purchase of the same product. The only downside for me is that non water-based liquids stain the material very easily (and the reason I got this new one) so I took one star away for that. Ultimately though I can work around that due to how comfy this cover makes my bed. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S Ori

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I decided to redecorate my room but didn’t want to buy a whole new comforter set. I had a queen size comforter so I just used the duvet cover for it. The cover is a few inches too big on both sides so I was worried it wouldn’t fit well, but it fits just fine! It is a bit wrinkly, but I don’t mind. The cover is soft and light, which is nice for all seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Hayhurst

customer_reviews.title: Someone please make a wider duvet and insert!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the softness and even the wrinkles really don’t bother me too much(wish it was smoother, but I’ll deal). I don’t know if there really is much this company can do about width as all inserts are probably the same size but seriously... why are they all so small?? Is it so hard to add 10 extra inches so the thing actually covers the mattress??? Mattresses these days are thick. Our is 15” and this comforter is 4-6” from even covering it! It looks terrible! I would not recommend based on this fact alone if you have a newer mattress. Everything else about it is great/doable, but the width really frustrates the heck out of me and my husband.
customer_reviews.author: ALake

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit properly
customer_reviews.text: This duvet doesn’t fit my insert properly (it’s too big) and could use for a longer zipper so it would be less of an ordeal to put the insert into. The underside is a wrinkled mess that’s why I keep it on that side. A lot of wrinkles. Pretty color though.
customer_reviews.author: QPensive

customer_reviews.title: Bad luck with a used one..bed bug sheddings
customer_reviews.text: I honestly feel like mine was one that might’ve been returned from a previous customer. I just received it out of the packaging, and there was a long loose threading the duvet cover, a small stain on the pillowcase (doesn’t look like bodily fluids. More like something light and sticky was dropped on it), and a light brown hair on the duvet cover. After taking a closer look at the materials, I noticed there were bed bug sheddings on it. I’m highly upset and will be returning! I’m addition to, I didn’t like that the sham border was super floppy. However, I guess being that it was cheap, I shouldn’t expect them to have structure like in a hotel.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and soft material!
customer_reviews.text: Our old duvet cover was in need of replacement so I searched for a new cover that would look nice and was made out of good quality material. This one had great reviews and the price was reasonable so I decided to purchase. We were not disappointed! The color is nice and the fabric is soft. The inside of the cover even has little ties to help hold the corners of our blanket in tact. We'd highly recommend this to anyone looking for a duvet cover!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy P.A.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited because of the reviews. Literally smells like chemicals. Tried washing it in hot water and with fabric softener. Still smelled. Tried airing it out. Still smells.
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: Not wrinkle free but very soft
customer_reviews.text: We are used to have two blankets (coming from Europe) so we decided for twin sized blankets and this set of covers. Pillow cover fits a queen pillow that was unexpected but very nice. It’s soft and feels good. I like the zipper. What I don’t like is the wrinkles. I washed it cold on delicate cycle and still. I had to wash it two times though because of the smell. Smelled like oil when I wanted to get it out of the washer the first time so I did run a second cycle. Maybe that’s why it’s so wrinkly. Time will show how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and comfort!!
customer_reviews.text: I almost passed this up because the price was so low, I figured the quality would match. Glad I read all of the great reviews because I absolutely love this comforter cover! It’s SO SOFT and comfortable. I’m going to order another one for my second comforter. Excellent buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Wrinkled on purpose fabric not from delivery. It’s actually crepe like, very thin, I don’t see any hint of microfiber, and many imperfections on the fabric. Bought cause I had an amazon gift card to use and regretting it big time. Thanks China, I’ll stick with Target and Wayfair!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rios

customer_reviews.title: Duvet cover opening too small
customer_reviews.text: The zippered opening for inserting the duvet is quite small, about half the length of the duvet, so inserting the duvet into it is quite a nuisance. If you have heard of the "burrito method" for inserting a duvet, don't expect to easily use that method with this cover because the opening is much too small. Considering I will like to remove the duvet cover regularly in order to wash it, this doesn't seem practical to me. Also, the material is quite thin and seems cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: This cover comes as advertised, I just realize that I really do prefer 100% cotton over micro fiber. It is soft, (feels synthetic to me). I have several because as much as I love my dog, and he sleeps on the bed, I cannot stand dog hair. I wash the cover every other day so I swap them out. This particular one seems to release the fur more easily and sometimes tempted to go an extra day without changing over. The inside has ties for the duvet and the zipper is secure, even after multiple washings. The color is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: West Elm - Never Again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve splurged on West Elm duvet covers over the years, watching as the button closures chipped away in the wash or the tie strings disconnected one by one. As another reviewer mentioned, I didn’t have particularly high hopes for this product but the price + positive reviews got my attention. Less than a week in and I’m ordering a second one. So, SO soft, great color (grayish purple) and easy peasy with the zip closure. My king comforter (sans tie loops) sits perfectly inside. I’ll keep my bedding splurging to flannel sheets and silk pillowcases from now on. Three-star rating because it does wrinkle, but I honestly like the look. JUST BUY IT ALREADY!
customer_reviews.author: sunny86

customer_reviews.title: Soft, luxurious look and feel at a good value
customer_reviews.text: I really love this duvet, it looks fantastic on my bed and the texture is pretty cool as well. I’m a weirdo that sleeps on top of my duvet (I live in Hawaii so it’s a bit too hot to sleep under a big blanket!) and it’s the first duvet cover ive had that wasn’t scratchy and itchy. My dog likes to lick the blankets sometimes and I definitely drool but it’s never left a stain or mark on the comforter. Stays looking clean all the time and is easy to take off and throw in the wash, thin too like a sheet which is nice for drying.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and soft, but not breathable
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I bought this duvet based on all the wonderful reviews about how soft and lightweight it is. And it is those things, but once you fill it with the insert, the microfiber blend is very insulated and doesn't offer any breathability. We are constantly waking up in the middle of the night sweating (and we keep our room very cold, around 68F). The quality of the duvet cover (color, material, stitching, zipper, etc.) are all very well done, but if you are a warm/hot nature person, a Microfiber fabric is not a good choice (especially if you live in a warm and humid area - like Houston). Unfortunately, we will be looking for another duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Sizes may vary !?
customer_reviews.text: Ok i would've given this duvet 5 stars, but the king size is way too big for my king size comforter. They are both king. But the duvet seems to be BIGGER. its frustrating making my bed😖😩 The duvet is very soft🤤 and the color is as described on Amazon. But if you're planning to get a king size? I would go for a queen. It will probably fit PERFECTLY. because king with king is too loose and the comforter goes all over the place inside. Even though its tied up🤦‍♀️ Overall its a good product 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Macedo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Sooo happy with this duvet cover!!! It’s exactly what I was looking for— crisp white, simple, inexpensive but quality. It was fairly easy to put over my duvet and fit perfectly. It does have wrinkles (which I’m actually okay with- I love the effortless boho vibe it brings). The picture does it no justice. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Garza

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Easier to deal with than my old cotton one
customer_reviews.text: I had a heavy cotton one and even though it is only a twin it was a royal pain to put on and remove. This one is much lighter in weight and smoother for better slide. And I like the zipper closure. I still hate the take off and reinstall chore but it is easier now. I withhold one star because my corner ties are quickly disintegrating into ragged stringy things.
customer_reviews.author: Grandavia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great, not scratchy!
customer_reviews.text: This is great value for the money! I’ve been pricing out duvet covers for forever now and finally I just gave in, bought this one because I couldn’t stand another freaking day staring at my old comforter and I love it! I washed it right away and the color did bleed a little but no biggie, it’s super soft, pretty easy to put on and the pillow cases aren’t scratchy at all! I’ll probably buy another in a different color once I’m ready to mix my room up again! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Hollister Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Not “cotton like”
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, however I rely on them when buying products... and in this case I didn’t read a review on how I felt when I received the item. So here it is: Bottom line, it’s polyester. It’s advertised as “washed cotton like”, which I optimistically hoped to get a dupe but it’s still polyester. Soft polyester nevertheless and has some nice features like the hidden zipper and duvet ties... for the price it’s a great buy (the reason for 4 stars). However, if you are hoping to find a crisp, vintage washed cotton this is not it. I will be keeping this as a back up due to the value.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Not very good- don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover is polyester. It attracts so much lint and hair to it and with it being black, you see everything. I have a goose down comforter that breathes really well but with this cover on it doesn’t breathe well at all, I get really sweaty and clammy when I sleep. the strings on the inside to hold the comforter in place are pretty fragile so I’m sure they would have fallen off in 1 or 2 more washes. I definitely don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathlina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soft
customer_reviews.text: The dusty gray color is great and it’s so soft. One of the ties inside wasn’t actually cut so it was just a loop but we made it work. Only downside is that the duvet (sold separately) and this cover weren’t quite as long as I was hoping for from a regular comforter set. I was wanting them to hang down on the bottom of the bed a little more for aesthetics and it is a little wrinkly. However no one else sees our bed and it doesn’t bother us any! :) I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kail

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I had another duvet cover that I liked but it was getting old so I ordered this one after reading the reviews. This is worse than a disappointment. The ties are pointless in the corners and the material is not wrinkle free at all. The bedding ends up all bunched up inside the cover so it appears lumpy and is very uncomfortable. If I could give this - stars I would. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS DUVET COVER!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the purplish grey duvet cover and it was more purple than the picture showed but returning this item was quick and extremely easy. I then exchanged it for a light grey duvet cover which was exactly as pictured and exactly what I wanted. The material is great quality although it wrinkles easily so make sure you lay it out immediately after drying. The seams are well sewn so I don't worry about them ripping easily like other affordable duvet covers and the zipper is small and inconspicuous while still being good quality. This duvet cover has the quality of an expensive duvet cover while still being very affordable. Definitely recommend this duvet cover!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Color & size off
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover was very soft I really liked it. I went through the hassle of washing it and then I tried to put it on my duvet. This was way too big. I ordered a king because that is the size of my bed & my duvet. unfortunately I still had a good 4" extra all around. Also I got the grayish blue color and there is definitely some hint of green. Almost like a Dusty sea blue green type color. The color is beautiful it just wasn't what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Super soft duvet cover and shams
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value! Super impressed with the softness and quality of the fabric for the price. I ordered king size and fit perfect! A little wrinkled out of package and as much as I liked it the color it did not suit me. I am returning this item so I’m not sure if once washed the fabric would wrinkle. I did like the hidden zipper much faster than having buttons. I would definitely recommended this product. I am considering purchasing another color
customer_reviews.author: Wahlee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before deciding to purchase and they were all correct. Straight out the wash, very soft and good quality. The zipper isn't all cheap and flimsy but heavy duty. Corner ties holds my insert in place and I also like the extra stitching detail around the pillow shams. Very good buy for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: SatisfiedCustomer

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SOFT, BUT TONS OF SNAGS
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying a duvet cover: once from this brand and another from another brand on Amazon. This particular one had tons of high praise and I was so happy with the softness and clean crispness of this one. I washed the duvet cover using the direction on the tag: wash with cold water and dry on tumble dry low (delicate) and the cover came out with SO many snags on the pillow cases and cover. A previous one I ordered has the same issue. I’m not sure what is up with it. Unfortunately, I have given it two shots and no longer want to take the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is for my sons room and I'm hopeful it stands up to his craziness. The ties in each corner are a huge bonus! So much of a bonus that I sewed on corners to the comforter I was covering just so I could tie it in. It's very soft, I didn't wash it so it stayed wrinkled from the package. Once it's used a little longer than a night, I'll update my review. The zipper was smooth and overall, this is high quality. I'll be ordering one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: CWalter

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’m mildly nit picky about sheets. I don’t care too much about high thread count, but I basically only need them to not have that cheap, plastic, synthetic feeling that super cheap sheets have. This duvet and pillow case set blew me away. So soft and cozy. The gray is beautiful. I’d definitely buy again in another color if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: This is my second purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase! Bought a white duvet for my guest room and just got this blue duvet for my master bedroom. The material is great! I thought this blue duvet would be more dark blue but it's more of a washed out dark grey blue. I'm not mad about it, I actually prefer it. However, for someone who's looking for a dark blue duvet it's slightly off.
customer_reviews.author: Jorda

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a sturdy duvet cover! Has a nice zipper at the bottom that had no issues operating. I put it in the dryer before putting the insert in and it got some of the wrinkles out but not all of them. It looks really nice on the bed as well. The only thing is that it’s not a bright white color. My sheets are slightly brighter then the duvet but it’s not super noticeable. For the price... you can’t beat the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Austin & Shelby K

customer_reviews.title: Pilling nightmare
customer_reviews.text: After the first wash was fine. But I washed it a second time and the pilling was AWFUL. My boyfriend sweats a lot in his sleep, so I have to wash the duvet at least once a month, if not more often. It’s now gotten to the point that it’s so rough to sleep with, it actually wakes me up at night. Do yourself a favor and find a nicer duvet cover!!!
customer_reviews.author: DuckTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover is perfect! My down comforter is old and feathers are beginning to fall out. The duvet has a zipper instead of buttons, which keeps feathers inside. It’s made of super soft fabric which is also sturdy. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Allietee

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell, had stains , nice fabric .
customer_reviews.text: Nice material but they smelled so weird almost like paint or a strong odor of plastic. It was so strong I had to wash them immediately as soon as I got them , the blanket also had stains! I added a picture of one of the stains. I do love that it has a zipper at the end though and the fabric feels nice .
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Simple, reasonably priced, and functional
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white duvet cover set for our guest room; I wanted something very simple to go with textured/colorful throw pillows and a cute throw blanket. I wish the duvet cover itself had a little bit of texture (instead of being so smooth) but it's a great price, soft, fits perfectly, and best of all it has a zipper (the button duvets are a pain in the butt!). Also, the two pillow cases it comes with are simple & cute! :) Overall I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love color & Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love the color blue exactly what I expected, wrinkles came right out after adding my comforter inside.. great value I would have paid 3x the money @ bed bath& beyond.. I’m on a budget so this was perfect!! Only 4 stars because I left note stating to CALL when delivered and I was not left at door.. I have had problems in past of people stealing packages so this was a big concern for me when getting packages delivered.. besides that product is 💯
customer_reviews.author: TeeJ

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it for encasing a blanket so that blanket & duet would not shift around inside. This does not happen. Blanket inside must be constantly relocated. Material is just to flimsy. Crinkled effect makes it look cheap like it really is. I would NEVER buy this again nor recommend it to anyone. People who reviewed this item must have been blind to its quality. Just terrible. I have been around a long time and I've never had such a poorly constructed item for my home. Thank heavens, I only purchased ONE. If it weren't for COVID, I would have returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought this would be a lot softer but it’s really not. It’s just like any other duvet I guess. I got a queen set, unfortunately the pillow cases were too big for my pillows and the duvet for some reason is utterly baggy on my comforter. I read reviews how it’s not too hot or too cold with this duvet, it actually does get really hot. Honestly not my favorite purchase..could have gotten something better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: alisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Duvet Cover -- Good Value for the Money but Impossible to Iron
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover is just what I was looking for. We had a down blanket that needed a cover, and plain white was just what our bedroom needed to top our shell and coral patterned down duvet. The only complaint is that out of the "box" the duvet cover was impossible to iron. Using a really good Rowenta iron on low steam didn't do a thing; neither did using a spray bottle with water and the steam setting. We gave up and put it on, and it doesn't look half bad. The cover is soft and cozy and we're enjoying it. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not breathable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match a now discontinued ducet cover I bought my eldest so toddler’s big girl bed will match. It is such a slight difference, I dont think it will be noticeable on the different beds. Its a super pretty, slightly salmon-y pink. I would NOT choose this if we lived in a warm climate; its that sort of material that traps heat and doesnt breathe. You would be a sweaty mess in no time. Its silky soft and fits a low-cost need for a child’s bedroom
customer_reviews.author: ReviewReader

customer_reviews.title: soft and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is super soft and great quality! I feel like it makes my down alternative comforter more fluffy and feels slightly more like down and the fluffiness down provides. Holds up well in the wash and fits in easily in the wash with my sheets. It has ties and a zipper, but I still struggle a little with taking it on and off. I'm not sure if there is any duvet covers out there that are any easier, but it would be great if there was!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Goode

customer_reviews.title: Quality and color
customer_reviews.text: This is so worth the money! Easy to tie up and install, perfect fit for the down comforter to go in. The color is the perfect middle of the road cool tone, medium grey. Not too dark, not too light. I’ve had this on for three days and the wrinkles work themselves out. It is nice and soft, keeps the down comforter inside looking fluffy and full on the bed and quiets the noise slightly too at night from the comforter inside. The zipper is a nice large regular size, not the hidden zippers that don’t work well and break easily, it also has a fabric flap over the zipper to hide it once closed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this in white back in February and I loved it. Super soft and I liked the slightly wrinkled look. Seven months later it has a few snags but that's more due to my cats than any fault of the fabric. I wanted to order a new color for fall and when it arrived I was sadly disappointed. The cover had three large holes in it. I guess you get what you pay for. I requested a replacement and will update this review later if the new one has issues.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: So high quality, so soft, great service- just a little more pink than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Hi there! The company was great and sent e-mails out before shipping to explain what to expect and proper washing methods. The material is incredibly soft-looks much more expensive than the actual price and is super easy to put on. I just want to let people know it's a little bit pinker than I anticipated, will prob fade with time but other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: krissieclvm

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The color is almost a black/ green. It looks like it’s sat out in the sun. I purchased a set of shams from Amazon after this purchase and they arrived today. You can see the color difference from the duvet cover to the shams that were purchased separately, the difference in color. I know there are many different shades of Black, but this is almost a greenish black.
customer_reviews.author: tayler turpin

customer_reviews.title: Started to pill after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it at first even though I didn’t look at the measurements and it ended up being way too big for my duvet. It’s soft and good quality for the price and the color matches the product. However, I’ve had it about three months and the fabric has started pilling very badly. It looks bad now and I can’t stand the feeling of the little balls all over the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Beller

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking!!! Just Buy!!! These are fantastic A+++++
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is AMAZING!!! I bought it for my 5 year old daughter's queen bed and washed it immediately. This material feels so soft and not microfibery (I made that word up) I'm tired of being scammed by those companies who have microfiber and say its 600 thread count cotton or 100% bamboo. The pillow cases came out looking ironed and I'm pretty sure I'm buying this set for our bed because the one I paid a lot of money for wrinkles the edges of the pillow cases. This is a great item and I'll buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Laci B

customer_reviews.title: I really love this duvet cover!
customer_reviews.text: You really can't beat the price for the product. I would be mindful of washing the material - low/no heat is more than likely the way to go, but otherwise, so cute - the pink is adorable! Just a tip - I use a medium weight king size comforter inside of the queen size duvet cover. Has a nice tight fit, with minimal bunching. This brand works exceptionally well for my method.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter, Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: I love this duvet! It was SUPER soft and felt so nice. I was excited to use it! I was bummed because after I washed it, you could tell that it was clearly a full size duvet in a twin size set. Amazon was great and refunded the item even though I washed it, but it was a bummer to not be able to use it. Overall it looks like it would have been nice it was the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Soft wrinkly duvet
customer_reviews.text: We loved this teal color and how the fabric had a wrinkled effect. We decided to purchase the matching sheets set to go with but beware the color of the sheets although same name of color were a different color of the duvet. A slight difference but noticeable. The duvet is so soft and has ties on the inside of each corner to tie your insert to. It zips shut. It’s made of a soft wrinkly cotton material that is cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Softer than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see how soft the fabric is. The full/double size fits perfectly (compared to full/queen which is always too big) so I was happy to find the right size. The fabric is very thin, so you can see the stamps on the pillow it's on, now I need to purchase additional white pillow cases. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase. However, I don't like all the little wrinkles. I washed it and dried it before use and it was incredibly wrinkly even after high heat dry. It's a good for the price so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Acosta

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I stopped second guessing myself and ordered this cover. I didnt want to spend crazy money on a simple cover but some of the reviews had me really worried. But omg this is the best cover. It's the perfect soft feeling, no tears, holds the comforter in place quite well. It is a little wrinkly but not enough to take away the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Duvet Cover!
customer_reviews.text: Love this duvet cover!! For people who give bad reviews stating that all they received was “a sheet”, you need to do your homework on what a duvet cover actually is. This cover is super soft, washed and dried up nicely. I put it over my current comforter as I just wanted to change the look and it works perfectly for what I wanted. It has some wrinkles but I like them. Adds a little texture. I plan on buying the white one too.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and soft!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. I threw it in the wash immediately, but upon taking it out of the packaging, the material was already very soft.After the wash, I did not have any color fading. After one wash you’d still kind of expect some of that new stiffness but that’s not the case. I would describe it as “lived in” which is exactly what I was looking for. And for the price, you can’t beat it. I honestly don’t even care if I have to replace it in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the package, soft and clean. My daughter doesn’t like overlap, so it laps on top of a full bed just fine (the twin size). Not a hot material either.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Soft in every way
customer_reviews.text: Unpacked and washed, line dried cuz its nice outdoors today. Color is exactly as pictured (pink). Has a great hand feel, correct weight I wanted as the stuffy is substantial I will use it with. Ease of use is terrific. Will be washing plenty of cat hair off easily so thats great. Did not take up much room in washer, room for plenty more items in there. Great purchase, happy as a pig in a blanket!
customer_reviews.author: linda williams

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and cozy, "crinkles" but doesn't wrinkle- you wont get big folds of wrinkles but it does just little crinkly ones just from being mashed up when you roll over at night. Looks kind of nice, actually- gives it almost a linen effect. I have very sensitive skin and the pillowcases do bother my skin a bit but I think one or two more washes will break that- they feel very soft to the touch, so I know it's just my skin having a cow. Something to note- the color is a little off. I ordered the off-white color to match my sheets and they're definitely more yellow than cream. They don't look bad though, they just don't match.
customer_reviews.author: Mari M.

customer_reviews.title: Stain proof duvet!
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the best duvet ever! One of my issues with having a white duvet is that they just get dirty from everything. I’m not a messy eater in bed but occasionally I spill here and there. Thank goodness I have this duvet or I’d be stuck with a stained duvet cover. Just spray a little water on and every stain rubs out just fine! Such a lifesaver !!
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh... it’s alright.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Super soft - Seems durable for the minimal cost Cons: - Blue-ish Gray is not at all gray or muted... it’s VERY blue - Sizing is off if you have a queen comforter insert. The Full/Queen is far too small. My queen comforter insert was all bunched up and lumpy. If I had ordered or exchanged for a King duvet cover it might have worked out, but since the color I wanted is so far off I’m just returning for refund. Overall, I could see this possibly working out for most people, but it seemed to me more like a duvet fit for a college dorm room rather than in the master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfy Vibrant Blue Duvet!
customer_reviews.text: Great vibrant moody blue! I have a “moody” boho theme and this fits perfectly. It’s vibrant but not neon. I love that the zipper is easily concealed. Most duvets are difficult to work with but I was able to place my huge king comforter inside in a matter of a minute or two. It does slightly wrinkle but that doesn’t bother me. Great value for the item.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Soft Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is much nicer than what I thought it would be for the price. I got the white and it's very soft and clean,plus I can bleach it which is nice. I haven't washed it yet and it's very thin so this could rip which is why I gave it 3 stars. When I wash it a couple of times and see if it does well I will revise this.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Sooooo Soft!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how silky soft this duvet fabric is! It seems quite durable but softer than washed silk. I also love the blue-gray color. Exactly what I was wanting for a light-weight soft cozy duvet.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a bunch of duvet covers before deciding on this one. I wasn’t expecting much as it’s so inexpensive. I am shocked by the quality, it is soft and perfect! I love the color and even the pillow shams are nice quality! It has 8 ties inside and zips up, seriously I cannot believe this was only $25!!! The sizing is perfect for my queen size bed too.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaR

customer_reviews.title: Very thin. Very soft.
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover is as thin as a sheet, though a bit heavier. It is very soft and comfortable. I put a very lightweight comforter in it. I get hot at night and this was light enough that I didn't have to kick it off. If you are a crazy person obsessed with ironing this will be a wrinkly treat. But if you hate wrinkles and ironing you should pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bausher

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because of great reviews but ive only had it for about 4 months and its pilled all over. I cant get the itchy little lint balls off so i already have to buy a new one. Dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: I.bodmer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!! LOVE
customer_reviews.text: BUY BUY BUY! I haven’t been so excited about a purchase like this in such a long time! Love this duvet cover and am going to buy more. I got the off white color, stains come out easily, spot cleans easily as well. It’s incredibly soft, love the zipper ( you don’t even notice it) and the ties for the corners are awesome. It does wrinkle but I don’t mind it after all, I think it makes it look softer. Highly recommend this to everyone! I’ve bought at least a half dozen covers and this is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Ideal and Not a Scam
customer_reviews.text: I looked a lot around Amazon for a duvet cover that 1) had a zipper closure and 2) wasn't overpriced irregardless of a King size comforter. Surprisingly this cover exceeded my expectations and is easy to clean as well as put on. The zipper helps me save time when having to clean up my apartment and helps not get other items in the dryer trapped inside of it. :) Def. consider getting one! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Shauntelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Great duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how soft this duvet cover is. I got the mauve color one. I really like the color. I noticed it was very wrinkly after i took it out of the dryer and was a bit worried, but it unwrinkled after i got the blanket inside of it. The twin size fit my bed well with hang down at the sides. The ties helps keep the duvet cover in place which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: 80abw

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money I paid for my actual down comforter I was hesitant to buy a “cheaper duvet.” Love this though. Really soft, doesn’t wrinkle, and has protected my expensive down from baby throw up and dog messes. Easily washable too.
customer_reviews.author: ABaru

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price! $30 for a king-size duvet is a steal. The fabric is very soft. I can't speak to longevity but one of the main reasons I use a duvet is due to having a messy bulldog that sleeps with me so anything over 6 months for us is great. I will mention, as an observation, not a complaint, the shams are HUGE! Like body pillow big. I didn't need the shams so no big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. I ordered the gray color and first of all its a medium gray not a light gray as pictured. Second, the texture of the pillow cases is different than the duvet cover; the pillow cases are crepey and wrinkly but the duvet cover is smooth. Im not happy with the overall product and would definitely return it if we hadn't already thrown out the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Didi88

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Soft !
customer_reviews.text: Covered a basic King-size down alternative comforter ... it fits perfectly , washed and dried well , and it’s super soft ! It does have ties in the corners , to secure your comforter and keep it from sliding around inside off the duvet cover . It added the perfect final touch that I needed .
customer_reviews.author: TXRealtor

customer_reviews.title: Sad product ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I trusted the brand because I previously bought the cotton and linen duvet cover. But this microfiber duvet is nothing like that one. The sewing is poor, I am sure it won’t last another wash. The fabric is extremely thin, I have no idea how it will handle the daily use with a down comforter inside. It is like they just sew two very low quality and thin sheets together. I regret my purchase, I was excited waiting for it to arrive and now I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Jones

customer_reviews.title: just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised! My full goose down comforter fits perfectly in it! The ties in each corner are amazing. It's all super easy to put together the color looks just like the photo! I'm very happy with this purchase! It also doesn't cling to dog hair which is nice it just brushes right off!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and wrinkley
customer_reviews.text: the color is bright but it came extremely wrinkled and was such a pain to put onto my comforter. Once the corners are all tied in it still gaps and is very loose around it's supposedly compatibly sized comforter. it's not soft either and looks horrible when the bed is made
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Must have.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This duvet really took me by surprise. For the price, you can’t beat it. It washed beautifully before putting on my bed, did not shrink or wrinkle. This material is so soft it’s almost deceiving how nice this cover is. By far the easiest duvet to put on. Plenty of ties inside and love the zip feature. 10/10 would recommend. I purchased this in white and it is a true brilliant white btw.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love it, especially for its price and with the great reviews but this was a huge let down for me. It’s super thin and just seems cheap, and so does the zipper. I will see that it is soft though, and that’s why it gets the stars that it does. Another thing I should mention is that it does NOT stay put! I am constantly having to mess with it and try to pull it and readjust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited, after looking for the best value for the money I settled on this duvet cover. It had great reviews. Upon opening up this package it smelled like chemicals. I figured okay I'll wash it. I washed it 3 times, let it line dry, dry in dryer, let it lay out. It still smells! I cant get the smell out. I decided I need to send it back. Unfortunately I missed the window of returns while on vacation. Bummer. To say the least I'm a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chealsa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this duvet for a short term cover while i house sat my friends dog. I usually only buy pottery barn. I was completely surprised at how soft the material is and how well it is holding up against the wild dog (who likes to dig in beds). I plan on ordering another one just to have for myself after the dog is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Kamryn Payne

product_meta.title: Bedsure Grayish Blue Duvet Cover Set King Size Soft Duvet Cover with Zipper 3 Pieces Microfiber Bedding Set
feature_bullets: PERFECT HOME DECORATION: BEDSURE Grayish Blue Duvet Cover Set features natural wrinkles intentionally to present cozy and live-in look simple design - Grey Duvet Cover King size measures by 104" x 90" is a perfect choice for homeowners with sophisticated tastes in home decoration - The chic pop of solid Grey color adds an extra layer of natural style to coordinate your room with vintage, elegant, or other decorative elements.

INCREDIBLE FEATURED BENEFITS: Refresh your decoration easily as a removable protective layer to embrace your duvet or comforter - Easier to wash and switch in different moods than your bulky duvet or comforter - Ensure you cool sleeps in summer as a thin blanket and cosy nights in winter as a warm shell with your comfy duvet or comforter - Easy care with machine wash cold and no ironing required to maintain wrinkled texture.

SUPERIOR MATERIAL SELECTION: Utilize 100% brushed microfiber polyester fabric to offer exceptional softness and comfort for all year round usability - Ensure longer durability with better fade resistant than cotton comforter cover - Apply pre-washed techniques to provide plush experience with ultra soft touch close to cotton - Hypoallergenic duvet cover keeps your body fresh to ensure a restful slumber all night long.

PROTECTIVE INTIMATE DESIGN: Help secure your duvet, quilt and down comforter in an ultra-precise fit away from slipping with user-friendly design by sewing ties in 4 corners inside your duvet cover to keep you comfortable all night long - Seal off your luxury quilt, comforter or duvet quicker and easier than regular button closure to speed up your bed making process with 63" long zipper closure.
WHAT YOU CAN GET:Bedsure Grayish Blue Duvet Cover Set King Size Soft Duvet Cover with Zipper 3 Pieces Microfiber Bedding Set
